data.name: Grilled Salmon
data.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with a light herb marinade, served with steamed vegetables and a rich lemon butter sauce.

data.name: Steak Frites
data.description: Tender, juicy steak paired with crispy golden fries and a rich, savory sauce that elevates every bite.

data.name: Roast Chicken
data.description: Slow-roasted chicken seasoned with herbs and spices, served with roasted potatoes and seasonal greens.

data.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
data.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with a creamy egg sauce, crispy pancetta, and freshly grated Parmesan cheese.

data.name: Lobster Bisque
data.description: A velvety and rich lobster bisque, perfectly balanced with a hint of sherry, fresh herbs, and a touch of cream.

data.name: Vegetarian Stir Fry
data.description: A colorful medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a tangy soy-ginger sauce, served over steamed jasmine rice.

data.name: Beef Wellington
data.description: Luxurious beef fillet wrapped in flaky puff pastry, cooked to perfection and served with a decadent red wine reduction.

data.name: Shrimp Scampi
data.description: Succulent shrimp saut√©ed in garlic butter and white wine, tossed with al dente pasta and finished with fresh parsley.

data.name: Mushroom Risotto
data.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a variety of wild mushrooms, finished with Parmesan cheese and a drizzle of truffle oil.

data.name: Eggplant Parmesan
data.description: Layers of breaded eggplant baked with marinara sauce, melted mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese, served with a side of fresh basil.
